name: Mixer Stereo
description: A stereo mixer with up to 12 mono or stereo input channels and up to 4 pre/post-fader mono or stereo aux sends.

specifications.name: Sends
specifications.description: The number of aux sends per channel.

parameters.name: Left output
parameters.description: The main mixer left output bus (0=None).

parameters.name: Right output
parameters.description: The main mixer right output bus (0=None).

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Output mode for the main outputs.

parameters.name: Send Destination
parameters.description: The output bus for the send (Uses 'Add' mode). Indexed per send.

parameters.name: Send Pre/post
parameters.description: Whether the send is Pre-fade or Post-fade. Indexed per send.

parameters.name: Send Width
parameters.description: Whether the send is mono or stereo. Stereo uses destination bus + next. Indexed per send.

parameters.name: Send Output mode
parameters.description: Output mode selector for the send bus. Indexed per send.

parameters.name: Input left/mono
parameters.description: The channel left/mono input bus (0=None). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Input right
parameters.description: The channel right input bus (if stereo, 0=None). Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: The channel gain. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Pan
parameters.description: The channel stereo pan. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Mute
parameters.description: Mutes the channel. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Solo
parameters.description: Solos the channel. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A text name for the channel for identification. Indexed per channel.

parameters.name: Send gain
parameters.description: The send gain for this channel to the specific send bus. Indexed per channel, per send.

input_ports.name: Channel Input L/Mono
input_ports.description: Left or Mono input for a mixer channel. Use busIdRef based on channel index.

input_ports.name: Channel Input R
input_ports.description: Right input for a stereo mixer channel. Use busIdRef based on channel index.

output_ports.name: Send Output
output_ports.description: Aux send output (mono or stereo based on Send Width). Use busIdRef based on send index.
